snippet: James R. Flynn has spent more than 25 years trying to explain why each generation has significantly higher I.Q. scores than the previous one.
abstract: Social scientist James R Flynn has spent more than 25 years trying to explain why each generation has significantly higher IQ scores than previous one; some of his theories are explained in his book Are We Getting Smarter? Rising IQ in the Twenty-First Century.
lead_paragraph: James R. Flynn has spent more than 25 years trying to explain why each generation has significantly higher I.Q. scores than the previous one.

headline.seo: James R. Flynn on Rising I.Q.’s
